about_the_game:
THE NECROMANCER COMETH!

The Necromancer Cometh! is a Dark Fantasy Pathbuilding Tower Defense Adventure with fun fantasy characters, spooky enemies, strategic deckbuilding, and limitless pathbuilding.

BUILD YOUR OWN PATH!

In TNC!, there are no preset paths or fixed tower spots—you decide where to place your towers. Enemies will navigate through the maze you create, seeking the shortest path to their goal. 

Your challenge? Force them to take the longest, most treacherous route possible. Every twist and turn you design could mean the difference between victory and defeat!

EMBARK ON AN ADVENTURE!

Embark on a story-driven campaign where strategy meets survival. Navigate and conquer ruthless environments, each with its own unique challenges and enemies. Master the mechanics, towers, and strategies as you beat map after map, uncovering the lore behind TNC!. 

Along the way, unlock powerful upgrades to prepare for the ultimate showdown with The Necromancer himself. 

Do you have what it takes to survive when The Necromancer Cometh?

CRAFT YOUR DEFENSES!

  • Unlock dozens of towers as you play! Mix and match their unique abilities to deal maximum damage!

  • Buff your towers to increase their damage and improve their effectiveness!

  • Improve your economy and rake in the gold as you kill your foes!

MASTER MAZE-BUILDING!

  • Where you place your towers is just as important as what tower you build! Build a maze which maximizes the effectiveness of each tower!

  • Force your enemies to take the long way as you block their path with your towers!

  • Defend against waves of enemies and mini bosses, each with a unique ability that will test your defenses!

  • Take advantage of the level features as you build a huge maze through procedurally generated levels!

DELVE INTO THE DARK WORLD OF THE NECROMANCER!

  • Explore the dark-but-whimsical fantasy world of The Necromancer!

  • Meet a cast of playful characters!

  • Enjoy the cheeky ska-inspired soundtrack!

Can you survive when The Necromancer Cometh?

reviews:
“It's just such a tower defense... It's the most tower defense tower defense I've tower defensed in a long time.”
Retromation

“If you’re like me and are a huge sucker for any Tower Defense game that can catch you in its clutches and refuse to let go, then you’re in the right place. The Necromancer Cometh! combines fascinating mazing techniques as well as awesome ‘towers’ and enemies to create a game that I honestly couldn’t put down. It’s one of those games that you don’t buy unless you’re ready to enjoy the heck out of it and want to play all the time.”
The Gaming Cavern

“The beauty of The Necromancer Cometh! is that you never get bored of playing it. Despite not having beaten all the levels yet, the game doesn't make me want to give up, even after failing a level ten times. I don't remember many games that have made me feel this way before.”
8.5/10 – Somos Gaming
short_description: Embark on a dark fantasy adventure in this pathbuilding tower defense game! Build huge mazes with hundreds of towers, unlock powerful upgrades, and face off against endless hordes of the undead. Will you survive when The Necromancer Cometh?
